name: London Plane Backpackers
description:
London Plane Backpackers is a vibrant and welcoming hostel located in the heart of Sydney, offering a mixture of dorm rooms and family rooms, providing over 100 comfortable beds for travelers. Recently renovated with modern amenities, this hostel is the perfect place for your Australian adventure.
Nestled in the bustling city center of Sydney, London Plane Backpackers is conveniently located close to iconic attractions such as the Sydney Opera House, the Sydney Harbour Bridge, and the Royal Botanic Gardens. With various restaurants, cafes, and shopping centers nearby, you'll never run out of things to do and places to explore.
This hostel offers a range of accommodation options, including shared dormitories and private family rooms, catering to the needs of different types of travelers. Each room has been thoughtfully designed and furnished to ensure a cozy and inviting atmosphere. Whether you're traveling solo or with friends and family, London Plane Backpackers has the perfect lodging for you.
The London Plane Backpackers hostel also boasts a range of convenient amenities, including a spacious lounge where guests can relax and socialize with fellow travelers from around the world. Additionally, the hostel features a large backyard, complete with BBQ facilities and space, making it the perfect spot to unwind and share a delicious meal with new friends on a leisurely afternoon.
To make your stay feel even more like home, London Plane Backpackers provides a well-equipped shared kitchen, allowing you to cook your favorite meals even while on the go. The designated dining area offers a comfortable space for guests to enjoy their meals and engage in lively conversation.
London Plane Backpackers is the ideal base for your stay in Sydney, combining the excitement of the city center with the comfort and relaxation of a home away from home. Join us and create unforgettable memories alongside fellow travelers from around the world!

houseRules.notes:
Reception hours: 08:00AM - 23:00PM every day 
Check in: 14:00PM - 23:00PM
Check out: 08:00AM - 12:00PM
Quiet hours: 23:00PM - 07:00AM

Cancellation Policy:
All standard bookings have a 24-hour free cancellation policy from the latest check-in time.

If you no show for your booking or do not cancel within the 24-hour time frame, you may be subject to being charged up to the amount of your first night's stay.

-Kitchen & Terrace will close at 23:00PM
-Towels are available for rent. 
-Free Wifi and free bed linen. 
-Lockers are available for each bed but the guest is required to bring their own padlock, also padlock is available for sale at reception.

All prices are quoted in Australian Dollars (AUD) and include Goods and Services Tax (GST).
All Standard bookings have free cancellation up to 24 hours before the latest check-in time. Cancellations after this period or no-shows may be subject to being charged up to the amount of your first night's stay.

A valid credit card and government-issued photo identification are required upon check-in.
Our shared dormitory rooms are exclusively available to guests aged between 18 and 40 years. Guests under 18 years of age are permitted in private rooms only.
We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and American Express as payment methods. Please note that any additional surcharges will be borne by the guest.
While we strive to accommodate guests booking multiple beds in shared dorms within the same room, we cannot guarantee this arrangement.
Guests are liable for any loss or damage to the hostel property, caused by themselves or their visitors.
Consumption of food is prohibited in dormitory rooms. The possession and consumption of alcohol on hostel premises are strictly forbidden, with severe penalties and potential reporting to authorities for non-compliance.
Smoking and vaping are not allowed anytime within the property.
